name: Fast & Nano
description:
[Update] Finally get NANO system and Jackpot working thanks to MADORA support. I upload a version with just this fix after the deadline.

A game created for the Madora Game jam

Win NANO crypto-currency jackpot!

(You can still play and test the game without putting money)

Principle
  • Each race costs a certain number of nano that go into a common pot: the jackpot
  • If you win your race, you win the jackpot.
  • To win the race, you have to cross the finish line in a given time, without falling off the track.
Features
  • Driving game 
  • Each race is different thanks to procedural generation
  • Pay to launch a race and give you a chance to win the jackpot
  • Withdraw your gains
How to play
  • Use Arrows Keys to drive
  • Or Xbox controller
Credits

All done by me excepts :

  • Car [Acc]
  • UI icons [Doozy UI]
  • Money sprite [Icongeek56]
  • Explosion sounds [iwiploppenisse]
  • Jackpot sound [timbre - robinhood76]
  • Impact sound [sheyvan]
Donation

If you like this game and want to help me make it better, you can support me by sending NANO to :
